ROE
Martin Hill mch@roe.ac.uk
Mike Read mar@roe.ac.uk
unique ID no., used to link tables
name in config file, used to name FITS file and generate thumbnail images
Hierarchical Triangular Mesh (20-deep) number
POS_RA_MAIN Decimal Degrees Master Right Ascension J2000
POS_DEC_MAIN Decimal Degrees Master Declination J2000
PHOT_MAG No idea. Candle-watt hours per cubic yard I should think Master Declination J2000
<-- and these ones! CX float Cartesian x of unit (ra,dec) vector on celestial sphere CY float Cartesian y of unit (ra,dec) vector on celestial sphere CZ float Cartesian z of unit (ra,dec) vector on celestial sphere GL float galactic longitude GB float galactic latitude A_V real Schlegel V extinction PROGID smallint highest priority programme ID BMAG real Bj magnitude from online SuperCOSMOS Sky Surveys (99.99 and 23.0 are nulls) RMAG real Rf magnitude from online SuperCOSMOS Sky Surveys (99.99 and 22.0 are nulls) SG smallint SSS star/galaxy flag 1=galaxy 2=star 3=unclass 4=noise ZCATVEL int velocity in ZCAT ZCATERR int error on velocity in ZCAT ZCATREF smallint ZCAT reference -->
